name: Wien Energie GmbH
boss: Michael Strebl; Karl Gruber;  Peter Gönitzer
membership: Oesterreichs Energie, Fachverband der Gas- und Wärmeversorgungsunternehmungen
goal: We create the basis for the quality of life and success of our customers every day with intelligent energy and infrastructure-related services, reliability and security of supply. We build on our traditional objective to supply electricity, gas and district heating in an environmentally friendly way. We concentrate our efforts on the Vienna model, both nationally and internationally, and promote both the use of renewable energy and energy efficiency.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Most dossiers related to the EU Energy Union, Clean Energy Package, Circular Economy
